rules_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle. Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“One more plane to search. Can't give up yet. Not while my Rhei's still out there.”[/i]
